title: Cardi B Will Bless Our Screens in Fast and Furious 9
text:
Photo: Shareif Ziyadat/WireImage

Cardi B will not rest until she guest stars in every new crime comedy movie, it seems. After making her memorable movie debut in Hustlers, Cardi will make a cameo in the next installment of the Fast and Furious franchise. Vin Diesel made the news public in an Instagram post with the rapper, who said “I’m tired, but I can’t wait. I ain’t gonna front, I think this is going to be the best one.” The casting news comes a day after it was announced that Latin music star Ozuna will be joining the cast. Fast and Furious 9 is set for release on May 22, 2020.
description: Cardi B confirmed to guest star in Fast and Furious 9 in Instagram post with Vin Diesel after Ozuna confirmed to star as well.
